text: <@UC2A2ARPT> I totally forgot to mention, I ported your prototype to a custom HTML element! This makes it easy to pull into any web page, it works with native HTML form submission, and it's easy to extends. Im interested in quirky inputs for the web, so we'll see where it ends up being useful

elements.text: I totally forgot to mention, I ported your prototype to a custom HTML element! This makes it easy to pull into any web page, it works with native HTML form submission, and it's easy to extends. Im interested in quirky inputs for the web, so we'll see where it ends up being useful
